<manifest android:installLocation="auto"> <supports-screens android:anyDensity="true" android:largeScreens="true" android:normalScreens="true" android:smallScreens="true" />
<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.VIBRATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="org.simalliance.openmobileapi.SMARTCARD" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.NFC" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.GET_TASKS" />
<uses-sdk android:minSdkVersion="8" android:targetSdkVersion="17" />
<application android:allowBackup="true" android:taskAffinity="com.junnet.heepay" >
<activity android:name="com.mappn.sdk.uc.LoginActivity" android:screenOrientation="behind" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Translucent.NoTitleBar" /> <!-- 启动页 --> <activity android:name="com.mappn.sdk.init.SplashActivity" android:screenOrientation="behind" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.NoTitleBar.Fullscreen" /> <!-- 邀请码页面 --> <activity android:name="com.mappn.sdk.uc.BindPhoneNumActivity" android:screenOrientation="behind" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Translucent.NoTitleBar" /> <activity android:name="com.mappn.sdk.floatview.NomalQuestionActivity" android:screenOrientation="behind" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Translucent.NoTitleBar" /> <!-- 充值支付页面 --> <activity android:name="com.mappn.sdk.gfanpay.ChargeActivity" android:screenOrientation="behind" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Translucent.NoTitleBar" /> <!-- 消费页面 --> <activity android:name="com.mappn.sdk.gfanpay.ConsumeActivity" android:screenOrientation="behind" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Translucent.NoTitleBar" /> <activity android:name="com.mappn.sdk.uc.RegisterActivity" android:screenOrientation="behind" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Translucent.NoTitleBar" /> <activity android:name="com.mappn.sdk.floatview.GiftCenterActivity" android:screenOrientation="behind" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Translucent.NoTitleBar" /> <activity android:name="com.mappn.sdk.uc.ModfiyActivity" android:screenOrientation="behind" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Translucent.NoTitleBar" /> <activity android:name="com.mappn.sdk.uc.PersonalCenterActivity" android:screenOrientation="behind" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Translucent.NoTitleBar" />
<!-- 现在支付 --> <activity android:name="com.ipaynow.plugin.activity.PayMethodActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation" android:exported="false" android:screenOrientation="portrait" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Dialog" />
<!-- 微信支付 --> <activity android:name="com.ipaynow.plugin.inner_plugin.wechatwp.activity.WeChatNotifyActivity" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.NoDisplay" /> <!-- 银联支付 --> <activity android:name="com.unionpay.uppay.PayActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden" android:excludeFromRecents="true" android:screenOrientation="portrait" android:windowSoftInputMode="adjustResize" /> <activity android:name="com.mappn.sdk.uc.MyGfanTicket" android:screenOrientation="behind" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Translucent.NoTitleBar" /> <!-- 充值卡支付 --> <activity android:name="com.mappn.sdk.gfanpay.phoneCard.PhoneCardActivity" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Translucent.NoTitleBar" /> <activity android:name="com.mappn.sdk.uc.CardsBoxActivity" android:screenOrientation="behind" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Translucent.NoTitleBar" /> <activity android:name="com.mappn.sdk.uc.RecordsOfConsumptionActivity" android:screenOrientation="behind" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Translucent.NoTitleBar" /> <activity android:name="com.mappn.sdk.floatview.NotificationDetailActivity" android:screenOrientation="behind" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Translucent.NoTitleBar" /> <activity android:name="com.mappn.sdk.uc.UnBindPhoneActivity" android:screenOrientation="behind" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Translucent.NoTitleBar" />
<!-- 设置机锋支付 key(appkey),登录开发者后台申请 --> <meta-data android:name="gfan_pay_appkey" android:value="330543028" /> <!-- 开发者自定义的应用推广渠道标识, 要求不超过10位,只能包含数 字、字母及符号“.” --> <meta-data android:name="gfan_cpid" android:value="渠道1" /> <!-- end for gfan sdk -->
<!-- 游戏同步信息 --> </application> </manifest>
